patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: FHIR identifier for the patient whose nutrition order details are being requested.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

NutritionOrder.Name: NutritionOrder
NutritionOrder.Description: An instance of the STU3 NutritionOrder resource.

comment.Name: extension
comment.Description: An explanation of dietary recommendations. This element is returned only for organizations in the Netherlands.

dateTime.Name: dateTime
dateTime.Description: The date and time of an order.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-NutritionAdvice

oralDiet.Name: oralDiet
oralDiet.Description: The details of a diet order.

modifier.Name: modifier
modifier.Description: Describes the texture of food as part of a diet.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The patient whom the nutrition orders are related to.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
The status of a nutrition order. Possible statuses include:

  • draft
  • active
  • completed
  • revoked
  • unknown
  • entered-in-error
